document.full_text: the young united states squad began their ice hockey world championship with a 5-1 victory over austria on saturday, while finland enjoyed a revenge win against denmark with the same score.
document.title: u.s. and finland begin worlds with easy wins
lines_and_colors: the young united states squad began their ice hockey world championship with a 5-1 victory over austria on saturday, while finland enjoyed a revenge win against denmark with the same score.
